raytracer.data.parser
Class SceneBuilder

java.lang.Object
  raytracer.data.parser.SceneBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ParserHandler
public class SceneBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParserHandler

Class used to build a scene from a given sdl file. Implements the ParserHandler interface (these methods need to be filled in by you). Note that this class keeps the absolute path to the directory where the sdl file was found. If you put your textures in the same directory, you can use this path to construct an absolute file name for each texture. You will probably need absolute file names when loading the texture.

loadScene

public Scene loadScene(java.lang.String filename)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
Load a scene.

Parameters:
filename - The name of the file that contains the scene.
Returns:
The scene, or null if something went wrong.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - The file could not be found.
